name: The Evil Grapes
description:
The Evil Grapes attacked your garden. Help Mr. Tomato to defeat him!

In this bossfight-game you have one goal: defeat The Evil Grapes, who wants to kill you in many different ways.

Gain more skills by having less lives: learn jumping, double jumping and even floating.

  • Unlock jumping by having 2 or less lives
  • Unlock double jumping and floating by having 1 life

For best experience use controller.
